attributes.action: Ban and criminalize any religious text that advocates harm to other humans.
attributes.additional_details:
Religious text are welcomed in society as long as they do not promote acts of hate or persecution towards others. Religious text should not promote death or violence to others in the name of religion. Religious text should not glorify the death of others in the name of religion. 

If a religion is a peaceful religion; then any religious and non religious person would sign this petition of peace. 

Religious text should be a peaceful religious text. Lets influence religion to be peaceful to all
